product_name: The North Face Storm Hiking Boots - Girls'
long_description: A sturdy hiking boot with bursts of color your young adventurer will love, the girls' Storm Hiking Boots from The North Face keep her feet snug and secure while she tackles tough trails. Suede leather and mesh uppers provide durable, flexible coverage with plenty of breathability for comfort in warm weather. Gusseted tongue keeps out trail debris; toe bumpers and heel guards protect against impact. Injection-molded EVA midsoles provide cushioning and support for long days on her feet. Durable rubber outsoles on the girls' Storm Hiking Boots from Then North Face offer excellent traction on a variety of surfaces.
short_description: A sturdy hiking boot with bursts of color your young adventurer will love, the girls' Storm Hiking Boots from The North Face keep her feet snug and secure while she tackles tough trails.
